alert.note: Alert for Niobrara County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 3:17AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Sioux and east central Niobrara Counties through 400 AM MDT... At 317 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm 13 miles south of Redbird, or 24 miles southwest of Edgemont, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Sioux and east central Niobrara Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
